name: Mobrill
description:
At Mobrill we firmly believe "Experience Brilliance" as our tagline proudly says.
Mobrill is a team of 50+ Technocrats with a single notion in mind to craft Technologically Beautiful Apps across All major platforms. I.e iOS, Android, Windows. Our team is dedicated to create a dent in "Mobile Universe" via their built apps.
Mobrill offers a consultative, 360-degree approach. We have team of dedicated "Client Relationship managers" who are their to assist and update you on each and every development.
The Usp of Mobrill is their amalgamation of Art and Technology which results in Apps which are built to Top APP stores across.
We've created resourceful Mobile apps and Thrilling Mobile Games for Top of the line clients across the world.
